channel.title: How do I...?
channel.description: I use the Testscape source, but I can't seem to find out how to edit my character's stats. I want to get them all to 99, since, of course, I am the owner of Generalscape. How do I change it? And, also, whenever I make a change in client.java, I compile it afterwards. Thing is, none of the changes take effect ingame. What do I do with this???

item.title: How do I...?
item.dc:creator: @omfgbbqsauce omfgbbqsauce
item.description:
@omfgbbqsauce wrote:

You logg out? Your server has to be off…

Read full topic

item.title: How do I...?
item.dc:creator: @The_General The General
item.description:
@The_General wrote:

OK, so I know that, but now my second problem. When I edit something in client.java, and then compile it, the changes don’t take effect (yes, I logged out while editing cllient). What’s goin on?..[br][size=1]Posted on: September 29, 2007, 06:39:12 PM[/size][hr]Anyone?

Read full topic

item.title: How do I...?
item.dc:creator: @omfgbbqsauce omfgbbqsauce
item.description:
@omfgbbqsauce wrote:

The Level as well…is what i do is put the stat to 99…xp:40000000 But thats what i do

item.title: How do I...?
item.dc:creator: @ChemicalReaction1 ChemicalReaction™
item.description:
@ChemicalReaction1 wrote:

Go to the charecter file and go down and you should see charecter skills. thats them. edit them + the XP.
